title: The One Where Miko Meets The Animals
shortDescription: A cheerful paperback where Miko meets new animal friends and learns simple social skills.
longDescription: Join Miko the baby elephant as he explores the jungle and meets playful animal friends. A gentle story that introduces animal names, sounds, and basic social cues — perfect for ages 0–3.

author: NitiVidya
metaTitle: Miko Meets The Animals — Paperback for toddlers | NitiVidya Books
metaDescription: Join Miko as he meets new animal friends. Bright, durable paperback for ages 0–3. Perfect first-read for curious toddlers.

bannerSubtitle: Playful animal friends and gentle social cues for tiny readers

title: The One Where Miko Celebrates Festivals
shortDescription: A colorful celebration of festivals through Miko's playful eyes — perfect to introduce cultural moments to little ones.
longDescription: Celebrate colors, songs, and joyful traditions with Miko. This vibrant paperback introduces festival basics through simple language and bright illustrations — suitable for ages 0–3.

title: The One Where Miko Learns The Actions
shortDescription: A bright book that teaches simple actions and verbs — perfect for early language building.
longDescription: Help your toddler explore action words — jump, run, clap — through charming illustrations and playful prompts with Miko. Great for read-aloud and vocabulary building (0–3 yrs).

title: The One With The Gods & Goddesses
shortDescription: A calm, gentle introduction to selected gods and goddesses through friendly illustrations for toddlers.
longDescription: A soft, age-appropriate introduction to a few gods and goddesses, told through playful visuals and simple sentences. Designed to be respectful, gentle, and suitable for very young readers (0–3 yrs).

title: The One Where Miko Learns Manners
shortDescription: A sweet, practical book to teach toddlers simple manners through Miko's examples.
longDescription: Teach kindness, greetings, and simple manners with Miko. This paperback uses short scenes and gentle repetition to build good habits in tiny readers.
